version.changed: Moved dia package to pdb.dia and introduced a new interface PdbReader in order to abstract the PDB reading mechanism. The former PdbReader is now implemented in NativePdbReader
version.added: Support for native 64bit DIA access, therefore pdb information can be used on Windows64+Java64 as well
Added an external eclipse launch configuration to generate the NativePdbReader.h

version.fixed: Fixed two small bugs in the custom attribute signature handling
version.added: Better #Strings stream handling, cycle avoidance and bounds checks for obfuscated assemblies
version.fixed: Fixed memory leak in log handler
version.added: Added new method to get the implicitly used type specs embedded inside the binary signatures
New methods for the Field interface: getFullQualifiedName and getParent (on trial)
New methods for the Property interface: getFullQualifiedName and getParent (on trial)
"--bca" option for Facile to dump custom attributes in binary format when outputting to ILAsm
version.fixed: Problem when testing flags for isInterface and isClass methods (and some internal methods)
ILAsmRenderer output is basically ILAsm conform
version.added: Methods for TypeSpecEntry: getMostInnerEnclosedTypeRef and getMostInnerEnclosedTypeSpec
Methods for generic argument handling: TypeSpecEntry::porpagateGenericArguments, ParamEntry::linkGenericNameToType and FieldEntry::linkGenericNameToType (all on trial)
version.changed: GenericParamEntry::setConstraint renamed to GenericParamEntry::addConstraint for better understanding
ParamEntry now returns a valid owner (null before)
